Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: proceeds from payments for other financing activities
proceeds from payments to minority shareholders
proceeds from repayments of borrowings by consolidated sponsored investment products
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: issuance of subco units common shares in connection with acquisitions
stock issued during period value acquisitions
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock
treasury stock retired cost method amount

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): asset acquisition consideration transferred contingent consideration
payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: equity method investment dividends or distributions
net consolidations deconsolidations of sponsored investment funds
net purchases proceeds within consolidated sponsored investment products
proceeds from equity method investment dividends or distributions return of capital
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale maturity and collections of investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
increase decrease in employee related liabilities
increase decrease in other operating assets
increase decrease in other operating liabilities
Depreciation and Amortization: operating lease right of use asset amortization expense
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: income loss from equity method investments
net gains losses realized on consolidated sponsored investment products

__unmapped__: increase decrease in non controlling interests
